Title: Tea Leaves
Plot: As Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce tries to build upon its current business, Peggy is given new responsibility. Don and Harry indulge a client. Betty contemplates her mortality after seeing a doctor.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: John Sloman, Teyonah Parris, Ben Feldman, Pamela Dunlap, Adria Tennor, Robin Pearson Rose, Stephen Mendel, Hayley McFarland, Ken Barnett
